code: import React from'react';import classNames from'classnames';import{messagesRef}from'./index';export default function ChatMessages(_ref){let{active,items}=_ref;function prepareMessageText(text){const msg=text.replace(/[<>]+/g,'').replace(/!{([a-fA-F0-9]{6}|[a-fA-F0-9]{3})}/g,'<font style="color: #$1;" >');return msg;}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classNames('chat_messages',{active})},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",{className:"chat_messages-list",ref:messagesRef},items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{key:index,className:"chat_messages-item",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:prepareMessageText(item)}}))));}
